list.name: Changes
list.comment: At the end, I called the Shape class and the Point class and its methods in MyApplication page and output them. Output shows the points and the perimeter, longest size and average size of shape

task.summary: I create a new file with name MyAppication
I create a new file with name Point
I create a new file with name Shape
I create a constructor to implement points of figure in MyApplication.java page to insert elements to array list

then I created method distanceTo to calculate the distance of each point and use formula Euclidean distance for this, it returns individual destination between two points, which will be performed by iteration in Shape.java page
I created toString() method to show the each point in brackets by order in output, which retrieves them from ArrayList
I created Shape constructor to get elements from ArrayList. I called it in MyApplication page and related them, then it will be performed to implement methods in this page

Here are created perimeter() method to find the sum of all shapes, which started and ended in the same point, for that case, we need to consider the size of arraylist, then iterate it. First, we have to get first point by index, then get the next point. After that, we call the method, where was found the shape size and add it and this will be continued until the end
By longestSide() method, we will find the shape, which contains maximum size than other shapes
Using the averageSide() method, we can find the sum of all shapes then divide to size of arraylist
At the end, I called the Shape class and the Point class and its methods in MyApplication page and output them. Output shows the points and the perimeter, longest size and average size of shape

MESSAGE.value: I create a new file with name MyAppication
I create a new file with name Point
I create a new file with name Shape
I create a constructor to implement points of figure in MyApplication.java page to insert elements to array list

then I created method distanceTo to calculate the distance of each point and use formula Euclidean distance for this, it returns individual destination between two points, which will be performed by iteration in Shape.java page
I created toString() method to show the each point in brackets by order in output, which retrieves them from ArrayList
I created Shape constructor to get elements from ArrayList. I called it in MyApplication page and related them, then it will be performed to implement methods in this page

Here are created perimeter() method to find the sum of all shapes, which started and ended in the same point, for that case, we need to consider the size of arraylist, then iterate it. First, we have to get first point by index, then get the next point. After that, we call the method, where was found the shape size and add it and this will be continued until the end
By longestSide() method, we will find the shape, which contains maximum size than other shapes
Using the averageSide() method, we can find the sum of all shapes then divide to size of arraylist
At the end, I called the Shape class and the Point class and its methods in MyApplication page and output them. Output shows the points and the perimeter, longest size and average size of shape
